title: Mix Tapes and Stuff
description: Where is the Schulyer Mine? It's a mystery that 15 year old Mix Tape wants to solve. His hometown of Schuyler was named after this mine. There is a big Schuyler statue at his high school. What was this mine? No one shares this interest. His friend Orville wants to be rid of the nickname everyone gave him, Popcorn. His big wish is to be treated like the brilliant person he thinks he is. Diana wants to walk again so she can go back to grade school. The discovery of the mine could lead to popularity and fame for Mix or Popcorn. Diana may have the key to the mine but she doesn't know it. Boys will lie. They will fight and they are no different from the adults around them. Who will discover the mine?
author: J.J. Lair
